sentences.en: Calderwood might smell the liquor on his breath and disapprove , but he was past that, too.
sentences.cn: 考德伍德可能从他嘴里嗅到酒气,从而表示不满, 可是他已经不在乎这种事了.

sentences.en: Do you perhaps disapprove of Agatha Christie and her Poirot and Miss Marple?
sentences.cn: 你大概不太欣赏阿加莎·克里斯蒂和她作品中的波洛和马普尔小姐？

sentences.en: He would doubtless disapprove of what Kelly was doing.
sentences.cn: 他不会赞同凯利做的事。

sentences.en: Her family strongly disapproved of her behaviour.
sentences.cn: 她的家人极不赞同她的行为。

sentences.en: I believe there are few at present who do not disapprove of this provision.
sentences.cn: 笔者相信,目前不反对这条规定的人为数甚少.

sentences.en: I disapprove of expurgated aditions of Shakespeare.
sentences.cn: 我不赞成莎士比亚作品的删改本.

sentences.en: I knew my parents would disapprove, but I went anyway.
sentences.cn: 我知道父母会反对，但我还是去了。

sentences.en: I quite disapprove of his behaviour.
Many people disapprove of streaming children in schools.
sentences.cn: 许多人不赞同学校里把孩子们按程度分班.

sentences.en: Most people disapprove of such violent tactics.
sentences.cn: 多数人反对这种暴力的手段。

sentences.en: She wants to be an actress, but her parents disapprove.
sentences.cn: 她想当演员，可是她父母不同意。

sentences.en: She wants to train for the theatre but her parents disapprove.
sentences.cn: 她想训练自己做戏剧演员,但她的父母不赞成.

sentences.en: The nurse recovered herself enough to disapprove.
sentences.cn: 护士刚一镇定下来就对此不以为然.

sentences.en: The workers strongly disapprove of the firm's new methods on the assembly line.
sentences.cn: 工人们非常不赞成公司在装配线采取的的新方法.
我们对他的鲁莽行为不以为然.

words.tran_cn: 不以为然地；非难地；不赞成地

trans.tran_en: to think that someone or their behaviour, ideas etc are bad or wrong
to think that someone or their behaviour, ideas etc are bad or wrong
